metadata.title: CVE-2024-50123 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:bpf: Add the missing BPF_LINK_TYPE invocation for sockmapThere is an out-of-bounds read in bpf_link_show_fdinfo() for the sockmaplink fd. Fix it by adding the missing BPF_LINK_TYPE invocation forsockmap linkAlso add comments for bpf_link_type to prevent missing updates in thefuture.

criterions.comment: linux package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-hwe: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'replaced by linux-hwe-5.4').
linux-hwe-5.4 package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-kvm package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
